intro: Hi, I'm Prashant Singh. 20yrs. Dropout. Sitting on my couch and building cool things.

articles.title: Deploy NextJs on a VPS
articles.desc: This article covers all the steps to deploy a NextJs app on a VPS with Nginx and PM2.

projects.name: Wosh
desc: A local first secret manager build using browser based cryptography

Wosh is end to end encrypted, directly injects shared secrets into your development environment, built on top of the browser cryptography. All data is encrypted on client side in 7 hierarchical levels.

projects.name: Proelevate - EduTech Platform

Developed a mentorship feature allowing mentors to book one-on-one sessions with students.

pastExperience.desc: Worked as a Full Stack Typescript developer for a Fintech Startup. Worked alongside the CTO to develop the Web3 based Global Payment System. Got handson experience on FIAT to crypto conversions, transactions and more.

Developed full stack web applications for international clients using T3 Stack and AWS services. Engaged in client communication to deliver high-impact and scalable web solutions tailored to business goals. Integrated analytics and campaign systems using PostHog and custom CMS platforms.
Gained hands-on experience with Docker, Django REST Framework, AWS (EC2, SES), and Slack bot automation. Contributed to backend APIs, cloud deployment pipelines, and internal automation scripts.
